trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> An isle surveyor is searching for an assistant.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the isle surveyor.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_01<tab>Use the destructive magick concept on the rocky outcrop.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_02<tab>Retrieve the ore fragments.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the ore fragments to the isle surveyor.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the isle surveyor.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_000<tab>Would you assist me, familiar?
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_001<tab>As I'm sure you are aware, the floating islands of Elpis were created to provide suitable habitats for our various creations.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_002<tab>In order to maintain their respective environments, however, surveyors such as myself must make regular assessments of their aetherial composition.

TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_003<tab>To that end, I was planning to take samples from the melanion habitat with my partner, but it seems he had an urgent engagement. Something about an unscheduled meeting with a member of the Convocation of Fourteen...

TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_004<tab>Though I'm now faced with handling this rather grueling task alone, waiting until he returns is simply not an option. As I said, it's important to gather data at regular, specific intervals.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_005<tab>And thus am I requesting your help. So, what say you? Would you be willing to accompany me in place of my partner?
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_A1_000_001<tab>Certainly.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_A1_000_002<tab>I don't know...
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_006<tab>Many thanks! I'll be sure to reward you for your efforts.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_007<tab>Please! I'll make it worth your while. The samples <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be taken at the right time!
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_008<tab>Right, let's hurry along, then. We'll need to make our way to the south.

TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_010<tab>The rocks in this area contain ores that can tell us about the environmental aether. We'll have to break them apart with destructive magicks to collect the necessary samples.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_011<tab>You may find that difficult with your inherent...limitations, but I have a little something to help with that.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_012<tab>Here, use this concept crystal to shatter an outcrop of rock, then bring any ore fragments back to me.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_013<tab>Start in the east, if you would. I'll start working elsewhere, and we can meet back here.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_020<tab>How did you fare?
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_021<tab>Excellent. This should give me all the information I need. Let's head back, shall we?
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_030<tab>Thank you. Without your aid, I wouldn't have been able to properly observe how the introduction of melanioi has affected their habitat's aether.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_031<tab>It's important to keep careful track of the environments here to make any necessary adjustments.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_032<tab>The terrain, the flora, everything that makes up the habitat must be meticulously controlled to fit each subject under observation.

TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_033<tab>Though I applaud my partner's enthusiasm for learning at the foot of a Convocation member, we cannot neglect these fundamental─albeit tedious─facets of our work.
